Reviews.Title: Ok, so far
Reviews.Author: Nathan Pullen "nathanep"
Reviews.Content: The description is not clear, and the photos are a bit misleading, the case on this is a light grayish color.  The label on the box says "almond". I was expecting white based on photos.Picture quality is ok, not up to the level of other cameras in my system, but it's only 420 lines while my others are 600, for the location/use it's in, the lower res is ok, it's on a corner of my covered outdoor patio to keep an eye on the dogs.I have doubts about how long it will last due to the plastic construction, but for the price it's a reasonable value. The lens is very wide angle and gives a good viewing area, better than my usual bullet cams.Listing says a power adapter is not included, though I didn't need it, mine did come with one. Perhaps they grabbed the wrong box off the shelf as there is another listing that does include the power supply for a few dollars more.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: HomeCoder
Reviews.Content: The camera is small, adjustable and affordable.  The picture it produces is more than acceptable and it's easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Fast shipping. Been using this for a while now and the picture is very nice. Color is a little bit off but for the price you expect this.Be sure to mount this high or out of the way as the bowl is easy to remove and camera moved... just something to keep in mind

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Older Systems too
Reviews.Author: Ava "Lady Dragon Humboldt"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace one that had died in my stores survellience system. I wasn't absolutely certain it would work but it did. My system is over 5 years old and this camera plugged right in and is working perfectly. In fact I just ordered another one for another spot in the store.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: marsha
Reviews.Content: I bought this Videosecu camera based on the price, the 420 TV lines of resolution, color video for daytime and super visibility than other security cams at this price advertise. Installation was trouble free, and aiming the camera requires no tools. I'm very satisfied with this unit and would not hesitate to buy another if the need for an additional dome camera arises.

ProductInfo.Features:
Color CCD image sensor.
420TV lines high resolution. NTSC system
Built-in 3.6mm lens for wide view angle
Small size, discreet installation
Auto white balance. Digital automatic backlight compensation
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV CCD Dome Security Camera 420 TVL f 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens for DVR Home Surveillance System DM10W 1CZ
